actions: Opens the Lungs, spreads Lung Qi, expels Phlegm, benefits the throat and expels pus.
With Gan Cao, disseminates Lung Qi, expels Phlegm, resolves toxicity, and expels pus for productive cough with hoarseness and pain and swelling of the throat due to Wind-Heat.
Moistens the Lungs, resolves Phlegm, stops cough, clears Heat and relieves Fire toxicity.

syndromes: Throat conditions due to Lung and Kidney Yin Deficiency
notes: Decoct and gargle three times daily.
